New Records: Aaron Jones could become the second USA batter to slam 500-plus runs after Steven Taylor (742)
Haris Rauf could become Pakistan's second-highest wicket-taker by surpassing Shahid Afridi (97)
Pre-Game Insights: USA are the team to watch out for. They stunned Bangladesh 2-1 at home and were off to a solid start versus Canada.
Pakistan have work to do with the batting and several shortcomings in that middle order.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The surface at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium in Dallas is pretty balanced. Pacers will get movement early on.
The temperature will hover around 35 degrees Celsius, and the humidity is expected to be around 50%.
Others: Pakistan come into the tournament with a 2-0 defeat to England in the bilateral series.
